mapper.insert: insert into t_users ( user_id, username, password, salt, nickname, gender, email, id_card, birth, phone, wechat, weibo, province, city, address, third_id, third_type ) values ( #{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{idCard}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{wechat}, #{weibo}, #{province}, #{city}, #{address}, #{thirdId}, #{thirdType} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_users where ${where} limit 1
